name: curl_command_writer
description: Write a curl command to fetch the given data from the specified API endpoint. The command should include the HTTP method, URL, and any required headers or parameters, this tool returns the curl file path of the written curl command

endpoint_details.description: The API endpoint to fetch data from

header_details.description: The headers to include in the request

parameter_details.description: The parameters to include in the request

body_details.description: The body to include in the request

additional_details.description: Any additional details to include in the request or important things to keep in mind
